website_summaries.verdict: Offers excellent wide-angle performance for the price.
pros: Wide-angle lens covers up to 3 lanes of highway without much distortion
of video, or drivers can use loop recording option
cons: Doesn’t record nighttime images as clearly, particularly license plates
Lens may lose focus in high heat
Uses sticky mount instead of suction cup, which some don’t like
Battery can fail when exposed to heat

customer_reviews.title: My fiance love it but the only complaints are the sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black $99 version. My fiance love it but the only complaints are the sound is a bit weird and not super clear when you play it back and you can't really see license plates clearly. But we love that you can view videos straight from the app. This version comes with a suction cup and a sticky so you can choose how you want to adhere it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Great while it works..... doesn’t last long though
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3-4 of these. It seems they have a limited shelf life. Great pic quality, great ap and easy to download the vids. Good sound too. However, they all seem to die after around 6-12 months. Unsure if it’s a deliberate design to make you rebuy, but v annoying. I live in CA. Perhaps the heat has something to do with it? Regardless, after a few months every one I’ve ever had starts to be unable to keep accurate time or date and eventually stops working all together. While it works it’s awesome. But they don’t last long enough....
customer_reviews.author: William Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent picture
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent picture, though not good enough to really read license plates pass a car length or so. For the money it will work great to capture a accident and other videos while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Schoenbein

customer_reviews.title: The is no real warranty on this product and no support that you can understand.
customer_reviews.text: Camera battery has swollen up after several months of use and pushed out the screen from the body rendering the whole camera useless. The manufacturer refused to honor the warranty saying something in hard to understand English that since it broke on its own than there is no warranty. Sounded to me like the warranty was something they offer just for show when they sell it and than you are on your own. Eventually I got money back from amazon after some deeper customer service conversations with multiple people. Don’t waste your money on this cheaply made camera that offers all the support and warranty as long you don’t really need it.
customer_reviews.author: MARKUS

customer_reviews.title: Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago after my other one finally died . I would highly recommend it . It takes great video and I have used several times to download video from dash cam to my computer . Occasionally the sucker will come lose , but I live in Las Vegas where it gets very hot , so it is not unusual . My old one after a while actually melted where the card goes in and I couldn't get the card out . It was still working even though it had melted . Wow . That was one of the older models . I really like the Yi .
customer_reviews.author: Woodaddy3

customer_reviews.title: Failed right after warranty
customer_reviews.text: Just about after a year when the warranty ends, mine failed. They won't replace it citing the 1 year period. I might go with a different brand for next dashcam. It worked well when it did, though. The other reviews warning about the battery instead of a capacitor was right. My last one before this lasted 3 years. I would not recommend this based on the blowing battery and customer service's unwillingness to resolve the design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Currently not compatible with IOS 13
customer_reviews.text: The Yi dash cam app Is currently not compatible with the latest IOS 13 for iPhones. This was tested on an IPhone XR and an IPhone XS Max. Your phone will not be able to view live feed nor download videos from the camera. It’s a shame as the device seems nice with 2 separate mount options and an included 16gb SDcard. I did not get a chance to test video quality as there was no point. The app does seem to work on a friends Samsung Note 8 with Android 9, however this does not do me any good. Had to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: ilovetacoz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Dies completely soon.
customer_reviews.text: Regret buying this. The buttons on the front stopped working in the first month but I didn't mind. Shortly after, it died out on me completely. It would not record and the screen just turned white, no display of the road. Piece of junk, don't waste your money on this cheap cam. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best insurance policy money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've had dozens of CAR DVR's and this one is simply the best I've seen in a while. Wifi compatible, auto on/off, comes with various items which you'd need to end up buying if you didn't already have them (long cord, sd card, wire pusher, etc). Cheap insurance policy that works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ytridmid

customer_reviews.title: Quality and reliable 2.7k dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to install, picture quality is superior, I bought three more as gifts as I have been using mine for over a year Very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky V.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Bought Nov 2018. As of May 2019 Only does loop record now. And only when plugged into power. No button functions work. Front of case looks warped. Maybe it's not supposed to be used in a car windshield. Its a dash cam for your house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: I love my dashcam
customer_reviews.text: I love my dashcam. Buying another one this week. If used with a 64gig card it records more than a day at the highest frame per second. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the camera come with wifi, its sooo easy to review your videos almost instantly
customer_reviews.author: leoBmx

customer_reviews.title: night vision not as good as the 1080p yi dash camera
customer_reviews.text: when it is recording in 2.7k, lights from lamp post and signs flicker in the video. if I change it to 1080p 60fps it doesn't flicker. night vision not as good as the 1080p yi dash camera, everything looks darker. voice command doesnt work half the time, picture quality is really good in the day time, Wi-Fi download is fast and convenient. once in a while the camera stops recording giving me a sd card error. I am using the sd card it came with. lane departure warning never comes on, don't think it works
customer_reviews.author: uranium

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I had an accident 3 months ago and the video helped when contacted insurance company.
customer_reviews.author: Mazen Kattan

customer_reviews.title: The image quality and build quality are great. The app is very well made as well
customer_reviews.text: The image quality and build quality are great. The app is very well made as well, which makes it easy to access and download the videos from the camera without needing to plug the camera or the SD card into a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It would often glitch after just about a month of using it. It would say sd corrupt please restore or something along those lines. I would have to turn it off and on constantly. After about a year it just won't work anymore
customer_reviews.author: abraham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and connect. Power cord is long enough to tuck between the windshield and trim to hide to make it look like it belongs there.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video and audio quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! The quality is absolutely amazing. The picture is so clear and the audio recording is just as great. I would put this dash cam up against any $150+ dash cam. If you’re in the market for a dash cam I highly recommend YI 2.7K Ultra Dash Cam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Tried different resolutions with 30 and 60 fps using the same Memory card that came with the camera and MOST OF THE TIMES I can't read the plate of the car right in fron of me! Once you zoom in -even if just a little- you lose details in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMED A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these dash cams for a short while but the image is great and the unit itself and mounting seems very sturdy. The picture is from the rear facing camera, through a tinted back window. For the money, I do not know of a better dash cam available on the market.
customer_reviews.author: mosher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install if you have hidden cables before. Quality of Camera is great, easy to connect to phone via wifi. Feature rich, great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: GWT

customer_reviews.title: ... think at sometime i will replace it with a better
customer_reviews.text: i think at sometime i will replace it with a better one
customer_reviews.author: Dean Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect resolution
customer_reviews.text: Now I feel more comfortably driving, knowing that this camera records everything and have a perfect resolution
customer_reviews.author: Javier G

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Dashcam, good price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected. The wifi function is really helpful. The voice command function is really useful, although it sometimes mistake what I was saying in the car as a command to take an emergency recording.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Chow

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had a 10% off coupon when I bought mine so it was an even better deal at $89
customer_reviews.text: 2.7K resolution, WIFI and a free app to view and transfer your videos to your phone. You can’t beat it for $99. Amazon had a 10% off coupon when I bought mine so it was an even better deal at $89. This is a high quality dash cam and has been working as advertised. The only downside would be that it doesn’t have parking mode capability. I will be purchasing another one to use as a rear view camera and based on my experience with this camera I will definitely recommend YI products.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. Day time picture is clear an crisp color. Not the greatest at night. Been using it for the passed 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to use! This is my second one I buy
customer_reviews.author: Elmert

customer_reviews.title: Links with iphone well
customer_reviews.text: Able to review videos in higher quality than camera screen on the iphone. Camera takes still pictures with voice commands.
customer_reviews.author: Blueskyranger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great car camera! Quality materials, and stylish looks! sd card 16gb in addition as a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: VIC

customer_reviews.title: website video is missleading
customer_reviews.text: Yi web site shows a sample video but in reality the images are not that sharp, they probably used a 4k camera and used that video as the demo video for the ultra, very shady...not recomended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: y love my Dashcam resolution 100%
customer_reviews.text: Really fast the shipment, y love my Dashcam resolution 100%. And keep getting more update for the dascham
customer_reviews.author: Hector Molina

customer_reviews.title: NO GO
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this model, picture quality on 1080 30p is extremely low, can’t see any small details, like license plate!!! Or face!
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Serafimov

customer_reviews.title: YI Dash Cam App is error
customer_reviews.text: I can't to play or download any video , photo through Wifi .
customer_reviews.author: Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a fairly priced dash cam that is pretty simple ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fairly priced dash cam that is pretty simple to use. Being able to look at the videos on your phone is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Horrible camera, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two years ago. First one exploded from the heat I believe (I live in South California). Although I use sun shade cover in my car every time. The plastic melts quick. The camera had a white screen and wouldn’t record anymore. Then the seller replaced it, but the new one also melted right away within months. I had spent $100 on this camera only to break because of heat within two years, that’s absolutely wrong. With less than $100 you can get a better camera that has more functions than this one. This is a basic camera with no functions what so ever. Save your money and get a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: feesho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is fantastic sound has an annoying rattle . Overall very Happy
customer_reviews.author: mark grope

customer_reviews.title: I thought the pictures would be better
customer_reviews.text: I paid up in price for this and returned a Roav branded one. The Roav had a ton of features but horrible picture. This one has a better picture but not by much and way less features. I assumed it had parking monitor, my fault. I was reading reviews tonight and the firmware is bricking cameras so I am afraid to update it. Would be nice to know if this is happening to all cameras or just a few.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: i was really looking forward to it and read lots of good review about it
customer_reviews.text: This is so disappointing, it worked for only 2 minutes and it would not turn on after i tried to update the software " followed the direction on the phone app". It would not turn on, all i saw was red charging light. i was really looking forward to it and read lots of good review about it. So it was anticlimactic and again disappointing. I will drop it in the mail tomorrow for return.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Mechanics are loose although camera is nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and good looking little camera. Had it up for less than a month and it already broke. The nob that twists and holds the camera from the suction cup was too loose and fell out. Waste of money I was really excited too:(
customer_reviews.author: Izawiz15

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband in November and it’s worked great until last week when it melted in our car ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy! I bought this for my husband in November and it’s worked great until last week when it melted in our car it was only 82 degrees that day!
customer_reviews.author: MaKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Was Nice,  but didn’t last :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved the camera, quality of pictures was high, videos were sharp and I was a happy customer for first few months, BUT when summer came my camera start falling apart under the sunlight , screen start coming off. Finally at the hot sunny day its just melted and fell apart while I was driving !! Purchased In March, had to throw to garbage November (today). Beware! No heat resistant !! P.S. I've contacted the seller for exchange but was advised to contact the manufacturer for help. The manufacturer told me to speak with a seller. So they have been bouncing me back and forth until I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mia

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Image quality is very good. G sensor is a bit too sensitive for terrible Oklahoma roads as it will set off the emergency recording feature when hitting potholes. Previously I was using a Drift Stealth 2 as a dash cam, and I liked that it would run on battery power, where this dash camera will not. However, everything else about the YI Ultra Dash Cam is better. The YI app is only ok, but as I do not need to use it that often, it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: tstone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. I have not used it for any accidents yet *fingers crossed, but i did post some vids of close calls and idiots on the road to instagram. Downloading from the app and from the micro sd were very simple. The 1 minute clips make it quick to take what you want after you find it. Quality isnt the best on earth, but i haven't seen any other cameras that can pick out license plate frames from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Brent P

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but takes many tries to link up with phone. SD card memory is quite low.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money but takes many tries usually to link up with phone or may not at all until camera is unplugged and off for a bit. It seems to need internet service on phone for it to link correclty. Would be a 4 or 5 if it linked correctly.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Hear Yi, Hear Yi - the best Dash Cam has arrived !!!
customer_reviews.text: If you appreciate having an unassailable wingman by your side (should an accident occur), if you want to be sure your recorded video is crystal clear (including zooming in for details), if you want a recorder that's easy to install/setup and use (including a smart-phone app), then look no further - here's your solution... just remember it's pronounced Yee when you brag to your friends!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Nistler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality and great video quality.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but felt this dashcam deserved the recognition. Honestly, I really wanted to use the GoPro Session as a cam but it doesn’t seem to be a viable solution without hassle. I got this unit and already have another on the way for my rear cam. It’s super easy to set up, you can download videos directly to your phone, no removing the SD card needed to get footage, and you can add multiple cameras to the app. Comes with VHB and suction mounts, unit stays steady. Fantastic dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: Francis H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: this is far better than my previous dash cam. I love the wide angle and great image quality. It fell off for the first time the other day, but i think it was due to heat. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry&Alec

customer_reviews.title: It is 2018 and it can't keep accurate time.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for a work vehicle however severely annoyed by the fact that the camera can not keep timel. My cell phone and my car radio keep the same exact time and after a few weeks the camera is ahead of those 2 devices and I have to set it. I have purchased other Yi products and I am shocked at how crappy this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cirz

customer_reviews.title: not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: gave it three weeks, thumbs down across the board, very poor quality software, does not respond to voice commands, microSD card incurs transient errors that require a reformat, software is immature. I'm trying to return it now...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power cable is flipped
customer_reviews.text: Make note that the power cable port for this model is upside down from what the other YI cam ports are. Makes 90degree power cables hard to maneuver into the port properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: No connection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased yi ultra in August 2019 now the camera would not connect to the phone apps. The old version works better than this ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for everyone who drives!
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is amazing! Wide field of view, and easy wireless download to phone. When it’s your word against theirs, the picture tells the true story. Already captured many close calls.
customer_reviews.author: StarBear

customer_reviews.title: Works great and app is great on my Android phone or Android head unit
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I'm using it attached to my Android head unit, downloaded the Android app, now when I turn on head unit the dash camera app opens, very nice
customer_reviews.author: Don Letterman

customer_reviews.title: It works just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Not the super clearest videos. Hard to read plates of cars stopped right in front. It's kind of big too. I'll give it to some for a birthday present though
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video and product quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good video quality, comes with 16gb toshiba micro sd card 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Think about it again before buying it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really not worth paying for that amount of money. I thought it was okay but now when I try to view/download my recorded videos on the app it would just shut itself and won’t let me save anything. DO NOT buy this product and go find a better one!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this dashcam, the quality of the video is superv
customer_reviews.author: Mig

customer_reviews.title: Superb video quality!
customer_reviews.text: Does whats its supposed to, nothing more, video quality is superb though. This was exactly what i was looking for from a dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: Laura & Sarunas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! easy to hide cables on honda civic 10th gen
customer_reviews.author: Migs

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not a great quality. The suction cup mount is kinda lose.
customer_reviews.author: Viorel Grijincu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, did not turn on after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: James Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable durability
customer_reviews.text: Product did not last a year. Screen separated from frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not update the firmware
customer_reviews.text: Update... contacted the seller and they have sent me a prepaid return slip, they will send me out a new unit as soon as they receive the item back. I purchased this camera about two months ago and today my app told me to update the firmware. As app was going through the process of updating, it just got stuck on the screen which shows YI see different. I have looked for solutions online but no solution found. IT worked well and I was happy with the purchase till this issue came up.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Ji Cho

customer_reviews.title: other Yi products are good, I have my house covered in them
customer_reviews.text: Returned, other Yi products are good, I have my house covered in them, but this did not live up to name.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for the money. Great video quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kash Z

customer_reviews.title: Seller: Please reach out to me
customer_reviews.text: The dash cam does not record HD video. I’ve tried all the supposed HD setting (1080p, 1520p) and they all come out looking low resolution when viewing through the app or on the computer. AND I can’t even transfer the files, only watch them remotely. Every time I attempt a WiFi transfer to my phone it “fails”. I’ve updated the firmware and bought a high endurance and card. I know the actual camera works as if I take a photo with it the high resolution is correct. The videos look like 800x500 quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: nothing special. high price. quality is average ...; (very upset
customer_reviews.author: sejki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift to a relative - No more feed back at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer G Jones

product_meta.title: YI 2.7K Ultra Dash Cam with 2.7" LCD Screen, 140° Wide Angle Lens, Mobile APP, Dual-Core Processor, Voice Control, MEMS 3-axis G-Sensor, and Night Vision (Micro SD Card and Car Charger Included)
product_meta.description: Drive smarter, see clearer The YI Ultra Dash Camera gives you exceptional image quality in 2.7K resolution, twice the resolution of 1080p, so you can capture and see vital details when you need them most. It’s dual-core chip provides high performance with low power consumption, and processes and compresses high quality 2.7K resolution videos. The 2.7” widescreen LCD screen with 4 buttons makes navigating through the YI Ultra Dash Camera easy and intuitive. Keep track of three lanes with the 140° wide-angle lens, added features include voice control, high performance night recording and a 3-axis gravity sensor to ensure safety and clarity when you’re driving. Package includes: YI Ultra Dash Camera, 16GB Sandisk SD Card, 3M sticky holder and suction cup mount, car power adapter, USB power cable, user manual.
feature_bullets: 2.7K RESOLUTION: Loop recording 2.7K videos With a high efficient H.264 video encoding, up to 30/60 frames per second; 16GB SD card is included in this product to meet your daily needs.
WIDE-ANGLE LENS: 140° wide-angle (all-glass) lens comfortably covers three lanes to allow you to see more of the road with minimal lens distortion.
VOICE CONTROL: Voice Control lets you focus on the road ahead while sending simple voice commands to your YI Ultra Dash Camera; Operating temperature: 14F Degree - 140F Degree.
LCD WIDESCREEN: 2.7” LCD widescreen features large buttons with an intuitive interface so you can comfortably preview the road ahead, and easily change settings.

rformance and 3-axis gravity sensor to store and lock emergency recordings. IN THE BOX: 1 x YI Ultra Dash Camera,1 x Sandisk 16GB SD card,1 x 3M sticky mount,1x Suction cup mount,1 x USB 2 Ports Car Charger, 1 x Micro USB Cable, 1 x User Manual
